name: Java Radix Library
short_description: A library dedicated to radixes, their conversion, arithmetic, and manipulation. It can handle numbers with fractions/decimals and arithmetic can easily be done on the numbers making it far better than the conversion methods found in the Long, Integer, Short, and Byte classes. It is helpful to many mathematical areas, those making games, and just to play around with.
summary: A java library fully dedicated to radixes and number bases.
